excerpt: "Tech stocks are enjoying a strong rally driven partly by advances in artificial intelligence, robotics, and automation. But such a robust rally in an otherwise stagnant and uncertain economic landscape has some worried that AI may be a bubble with the potential to burst as catastrophically as the dot com bubble."
